_sText:
MAKE SURE phys_timescale 1 IS IN YOUR SERVER.CFG BEFORE ADDING THIS MAP

mg_hellz_mutltigame now fixed, fixes are:

Star wars lazers map is now playable.

Made bhop platforms not go down (Fixed by Changed)

Bug where you get stuck on cannon is fixed.

Lazers in slide race are fixed.

Shortened the timer for the conveyor belt level.

Added command mp_flashlight 0 so people wont have to worry about flashlight bugs.

Fixed ladder bug.

Installation:

Copy mg_hellz_multigame_2012_fix.bsp in directory cstrike/maps.

All credits go to Pho3nix for making this map in the first place.
